DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a patient has uncontrolled hypertension.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the presence of uncontrolled hypertension, an excessive elevation in blood pressure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Not controlled, regulated, or constrained.:Abnormally high blood pressure.

Concepts.definition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have uncontr
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Uncontrolled hypertension defined as BP > 150/90 on antihypertensive therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension defined as systolic pressure greater than 150mm Hg or diastolic greater than 100mm Hg?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension defined as systolic pressure greater than 150mm Hg or diastolic greater than 90mm Hg

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension defined as systolic pressure greater than 150mm Hg or diastolic greater than 100mm Hg?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension defined as systolic greater than 140 mm Hg or diastolic greater than 90 mm Hg?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient suffered from uncontrolled hypertension?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have poorly controlled hypertension systolic BP greater than or equal to160 mm Hg or diastolic BP greater than or equal to 100 mm Hg

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension (SBP greater than 150; DBP greater than 90)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled high blood pressure (defined as systolic BP > 150mmHg or diastolic BP > 90 mmHg) with or without anti-hypertensive medication?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension defined as sustained systolic BP greater than 150 mmHg or diastolic BP greater than 90 mmHg?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension (SBP equal or greater than 150; DBP equal or greater than 90)

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension (SBP greater than or equal to 150 and/or DBP greater than or equal to 90)

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension, defined as systolic greater than 150 mm Hg or diastolic greater than 90 mm Hg despite antihypertensive medications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled hypertension (BP greater than or equal to 150/90 mmHg despite medical therapy)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have uncontrolled high blood pressure (defined as systolic BP greater than 160 mmHg or diastolic BP greater than 100 mmHg) with or without anti-hypertensive medication?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Chronic Disease Ind-3 (2018845v1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.21 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0001812. ak
